name: Crock Pot Roast
steps: Place beef roast in crock pot.
Mix the dried mixes together in a bowl and sprinkle over the roast.
Pour the water around the roast.
Cook on low for 7-9 hours.

name: Roasted Asparagus
steps: Preheat oven to 425Â°F.
Cut off the woody bottom part of the asparagus spears and discard.
With a vegetable peeler, peel off the skin on the bottom 2-3 inches of the spears (this keeps the asparagus from being all.",string.", and if you eat asparagus you know what I mean by that).
Place asparagus on foil-lined baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle with salt.
With your hands, roll the asparagus around until they are evenly coated with oil and salt.
Roast for 10-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of your stalks and how tender you like them.
They should be tender when pierced with the tip of a knife.
The tips of the spears will get very brown but watch them to prevent burning.
They are great plain, but sometimes I serve them with a light vinaigrette if we need something acidic to balance out our meal.

name: Curried Lentils and Rice
steps: Bring broth to a low boil.
Add curry powder and salt.
Cook lentils for 20 minutes.
Add rice and simmer for 20 minutes.
Enjoy!

name: Big Night Pizza
steps: Add hot water to yeast in a large bowl and let sit for 15 minutes.
Mix in oil, sugar, salt, and flour and let sit for 1 hour.
Knead the dough and spread onto a pan.
Spread pizza sauce and sprinkle cheese.
Add any optional toppings as you wish.
Bake at 400 deg Fahrenheit for 15 minutes.
Enjoy!

name: Cranberry and Apple Stuffed Acorn Squash Recipe
steps: Cut squash in half, remove seeds.
Place squash in baking dish, cut-side down.
Pour 1/4-inch water into dish.
Bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees F.
In large bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
Remove squash from oven, fill with mix.
Bake for 30-40 more minutes, until squash tender.
Enjoy!

name: Mic's Yorkshire Puds
steps: Put the flour and some seasoning into a large bowl.
Stir in eggs, one at a time.
Whisk in milk until you have a smooth batter.
Chill in the fridge for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oven to 220C/gas mark 7.
Pour the oil into the holes of a 8-hole muffin tin.
Heat tin in the oven for 5 minutes.
Ladle the batter mix into the tin.
Bake for 30 minutes until well browned and risen.

name: Old-Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies
steps: Simmer raisins and water over medium heat until raisins are plump, about 15 minutes.
Drain raisins, reserving the liquid.
Add enough water to reserved liquid to measure 1/2 cup.
Heat oven to 400Â°.
Mix thoroughly shortening, sugar, eggs and vanilla.
Stir in reserved liquid.
Blend in remaining ingredients.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until light brown.
About 6 1/2 dozen cookies.

name: Blueberry Oatmeal Squares
steps: Filling: In saucepan, bring blueberries, sugar and orange juice to boil; reduce heat and simmer until tender, about 10 minutes.
Whisk cornstarch with 2 tbsp (25 mL) water; whisk into blueberries and boil, stirring, until thickened, about 1 minute.
Place plastic wrap directly on surface; refrigerate until cooled, about 1 hour.
In large bowl, whisk together oats, flour, sugar, orange rind and salt ; with pastry blender, cut in butter until in coarse crumbs.
Press half into 8-inch (2 L) square parchment paperâlined metal cake pan; spread with blueberry filling.
Bake in centre of 350Â°F oven until light golden, about 45 minutes.
Let cool on rack before cutting into squares.
(Make-ahead: Cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days or overwrap with heavy-duty foil and freeze for up to 2 weeks.)

name: Curried chicken salad

ingredients.name: skinless, boneless chicken breasts, halved lengthwise

steps: ARRANGE chicken in a single layer in a large pot.
Add water to just cover.
Bring to a boil over medium-high.
Flip chicken, reduce heat to medium and simmer until cooked, about 6 more min.
Cool.
STIR mayo with lemon zest, juice, curry and salt in large bowl.
Using 2 forks, shred chicken, then stir into mayo mixture with mango, cranberries, green onions and celery.
Divide among muffins with lettuce leaves
Sandwich with tops

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
In a bowl, mix together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, and chopped rosemary.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then brush with the lemon herb mixture.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve hot with your favorite sides.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce and croutons.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad and toss until evenly coated.
Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese on top.
Serve immediately as a refreshing appetizer or side dish.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet, cook diced bacon until crispy. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper.
Toss cooked spaghetti in the skillet with the bacon and garlic.
Remove skillet from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture until the spaghetti is coated.
Serve immediately with additional Parmesan cheese on top.

name: Honey Glazed Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 400Â°F.
In a small bowl, whisk together honey, soy sauce, Dijon mustard, and minced garlic.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Brush salmon with the honey glaze and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve hot with your favorite sides.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange tomato slices and mozzarella slices on a serving platter, alternating between them.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle balsamic glaze over the salad and season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately as a light and refreshing appetizer or side dish.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F.
Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds and membranes.
In a skillet, cook ground beef until browned. Drain excess fat.
Stir in cooked rice and marinara sauce, then season with salt and pepper.
Spoon the beef and rice mixture into the hollowed-out bell peppers.
Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese on top of each stuffed pepper.
Place stuffed peppers in a baking dish and cover with foil.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until peppers are tender and cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot with additional marinara sauce if desired.

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and opaque.
Stir in lemon zest and juice, then season with salt and pepper.
Toss cooked spaghetti with the lemon garlic shrimp until evenly combined.
Serve hot with a sprinkle of fresh parsley on top.

name: Homemade Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 450Â°F.
Roll out pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to desired thickness.
Transfer rolled dough to a pizza stone or baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Spread marinara sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Arrange mozzarella cheese slices and tomato slices on top of the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper, then top with fresh basil leaves.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted and bubbly.
Slice and serve hot as a delicious homemade pizza.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
steps: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, minced garlic, and cornstarch.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add sliced flank steak to the skillet and stir fry until browned and cooked through.
Add broccoli florets to the skillet and continue stir frying until tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce mixture over the beef and broccoli, stirring constantly until thickened.
Serve hot over cooked rice or noodles.

name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
steps: In a saucepan, heat chicken or vegetable broth until simmering.
In a separate large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add Arborio rice to the skillet and cook, stirring constantly, for 2-3 minutes until lightly toasted.
Pour in dry white wine and cook until absorbed, stirring frequently.
Begin adding the simmering broth to the rice, one ladleful at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed before adding more.
Continue adding broth and stirring until the rice is creamy and tender, about 20-25 minutes.
Stir in sliced mushrooms and grated Parmesan cheese, then season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot as a comforting and satisfying main dish.

name: Baked Teriyaki Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F.
In a saucepan, combine soy sauce, brown sugar, mirin, minced garlic, and grated ginger. Bring to a simmer.
In a small bowl, mix cornstarch with a little water to form a slurry. Slowly add to the saucepan, stirring constantly until thickened.
Place chicken breasts in a baking dish and pour teriyaki sauce over them.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot with steamed rice and vegetables.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
steps: Rinse quinoa under cold water and cook according to package instructions. Fluff with a fork and let cool.
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, Kalamata olives, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the quinoa salad and toss until evenly coated.
Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese on top before serving.
Serve chilled as a refreshing and nutritious side dish.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook linguine according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and opaque. Remove shrimp and set aside.
Deglaze the skillet with white wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom.
Stir in chicken broth and lemon juice. Simmer until slightly reduced.
Return shrimp to the skillet and add cooked linguine. Toss until evenly coated.
Season with salt and pepper, then sprinkle chopped parsley on top before serving.
Serve hot as a delicious and flavorful pasta dish.

name: Thai Red Curry with Vegetables
steps: In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Add sliced bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, and onion. Stir fry until slightly tender.
Add red curry paste to the skillet and stir until vegetables are coated.
Pour in coconut milk, fish sauce, brown sugar, and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until vegetables are cooked through and sauce has thickened.
Season with salt to taste, then stir in fresh basil leaves before serving.
Serve hot over steamed rice as a satisfying and aromatic Thai-inspired dish.

name: Baked Lemon Garlic Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried oregano, dried thyme, and paprika.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Brush salmon with the lemon garlic mixture and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve hot with your favorite sides.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger to the skillet and cook until fragrant.
Add broccoli florets, sliced bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, and snap peas to the skillet. Stir fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and hoisin sauce. Pour over the vegetables in the skillet.
Stir until vegetables are evenly coated with the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve hot over cooked rice or noodles.

name: Crispy Baked Chicken Tenders
steps: Preheat oven to 400Â°F.
In a shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and paprika.
Place all-purpose flour in another shallow dish, and beat eggs in a third shallow dish.
Season chicken tenders with salt and pepper.
Dredge each chicken tender in flour, then dip into beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumb mixture.
Place coated chicken tenders on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and coating is golden and crispy.
Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange alternating slices of tomato and mozzarella cheese on a serving platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle extra virgin olive oil and balsamic glaze over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as a refreshing and elegant appetizer or side dish.

name: Sesame Ginger Beef Stir Fry
steps: In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, hoisin sauce, sesame oil, minced garlic, and grated ginger.
Season beef sirloin slices with salt and pepper.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add beef slices to the skillet and stir fry until browned and cooked through.
Remove beef from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, stir fry sliced bell peppers and onion until tender-crisp.
Return beef to the skillet, pour the sauce over, and toss to coat.
Sprinkle toasted sesame seeds over the stir fry before serving.
Serve hot over cooked rice or noodles.

name: Greek Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine tomato wedges, sliced cucumber, thinly sliced red onion, and Kalamata olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss until evenly coated.
Top with crumbled feta cheese before serving.
Serve chilled as a refreshing and flavorful salad.

name: Honey Garlic Glazed Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 400Â°F.
In a small saucepan, combine honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, rice vinegar, sesame oil, ground ginger, and cornstarch.
Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Season salmon with salt and pepper, then brush with the honey garlic glaze.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve hot with your favorite sides.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
steps: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add chicken breasts to the skillet and cook until golden brown and cooked through. Remove from skillet and slice into strips.
In the same skillet, pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
Add cooked fettuccine pasta and sliced chicken to the skillet, tossing until evenly coated in the Alfredo sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, then garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.
Serve hot as a comforting and indulgent pasta dish.

name: Vegetarian Chili
steps: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add diced onion, bell peppers, minced garlic, and diced jalapeno pepper to the pot. Cook until softened.
Stir in black beans, kidney beans, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, chili powder, and ground cumin.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and let cook for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with your favorite toppings such as shredded cheese, sour cream, or chopped cilantro.

name: Mango Chicken Curry

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
ripe mango, peeled, pitted, and diced

steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add diced onion and minced garlic to the skillet. Cook until softened and fragrant.
Add curry powder, ground turmeric, ground cumin, ground coriander, and cayenne pepper to the skillet. Stir until spices are fragrant.
Add chicken thighs to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in coconut milk and diced mango. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
Let simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and sauce has thickened.
Season with salt to taste.
Serve hot over steamed rice as a flavorful and satisfying meal.

name: Teriyaki Tofu Stir Fry
steps: In a bowl, combine cubed tofu, soy sauce, and teriyaki sauce. Let marinate for 15-20 minutes.
In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook until fragrant.
Add marinated tofu to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in sliced bell pepper, sliced carrot, and snap peas. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Drizzle sesame oil over the stir fry and toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot over cooked rice or noodles.

name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 425Â°F.
Rinse the chicken inside and out, and pat dry with paper towels.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, thyme leaves, and chopped parsley.
Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then rub the herb mixture all over the chicken, inside and out.
Place the chicken on a rack in a roasting pan, breast side up.
Roast for 1 hour and 15 minutes to 1 hour and 30 minutes, or until the juices run clear and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh registers 165Â°F.
Let the chicken rest for 10-15 minutes before carving.
Serve hot with your favorite side dishes.

name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and return to the pot.
In a small skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add halved cherry tomatoes and cook until softened.
Add cherry tomatoes to the cooked pasta in the pot, along with basil pesto and grated Parmesan cheese.
Toss until pasta is evenly coated with pesto and cheese.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with chopped fresh basil before serving.
Serve hot as a simple and flavorful pasta dish.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
steps: In a bowl, combine thinly sliced beef sirloin, soy sauce, oyster sauce, brown sugar, minced garlic, and cornstarch. Let marinate for 15-20 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix together water and cornstarch to create a slurry.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add marinated beef to the skillet and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove beef from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add broccoli florets and cook until tender-crisp.
Return beef to the skillet, pour in the cornstarch slurry, and toss until everything is coated and sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot over cooked rice or noodles.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: In a saucepan, heat vegetable broth over medium heat until simmering.
In a large skillet, melt butter with olive oil over medium heat.
Add diced onion and minced garlic to the skillet. Cook until softened and fragrant.
Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 1-2 minutes until lightly toasted.
Pour in dry white wine and cook until evaporated.
Gradually add simmering vegetable broth to the skillet, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly and allowing each addition to be absorbed before adding more.
Stir in sliced mushrooms and continue cooking until rice is creamy and tender.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese and chopped fresh parsley.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot as a luxurious and comforting risotto dish.

name: Thai Green Curry with Tofu
steps: In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add Thai green curry paste to the skillet and cook until fragrant.
Stir in coconut milk, fish sauce, brown sugar, and lime juice.
Add cubed tofu, sliced bell pepper, sliced zucchini, sliced carrot, and sliced onion to the skillet.
Simmer until vegetables are tender and tofu is heated through.
Season with salt to taste.
Serve hot over steamed rice as a flavorful and satisfying curry.

name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F.
In a small bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside.
In a large bowl, beat together softened butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract until creamy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Gradually beat in flour mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.
Enjoy these classic chocolate chip cookies with a glass of milk or on their own!

name: Homemade Brownies
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F.
Grease a 9x13 inch baking pan.
In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Remove from heat and stir in sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Beat in flour, cocoa powder, salt, and baking powder until well blended.
Spread the batter evenly into the prepared pan.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the brownies begin to pull away from the edges of the pan.
Let cool on a wire rack before cutting into squares.
Serve these homemade brownies warm or at room temperature for a decadent treat!

name: Classic Vanilla Cupcakes
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F.
Line a muffin tin with paper liners.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside.
In a large bowl, cream together softened butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs, one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in the dry ingredients alternating with milk, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients.
Fill each muffin cup 2/3 full with batter.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Cool cupcakes in the muffin tin for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Frost with your favorite frosting and decorate as desired.

name: Lemon Bars
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F.
In a medium bowl, combine softened butter, 2 cups flour, and powdered sugar. Press into the bottom of an ungreased 9x13 inch baking pan.
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm and golden.
In another bowl, whisk together eggs, granulated sugar, 1/4 cup flour, lemon juice, lemon zest, and baking powder.
Pour over the baked crust and return to the oven.
Bake for an additional 20 to 25 minutes, or until the bars are set.
Allow to cool completely in the pan before slicing into bars.
Dust with powdered sugar before serving, if desired.
Enjoy these tangy and sweet lemon bars as a delightful dessert!

name: Red Velvet Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a medium bowl, sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, and cocoa powder.
In a large bowl, combine oil, buttermilk, eggs, food coloring, vanilla extract, vinegar, and hot water.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until smooth and well combined.
Divide the batter evenly between the prepared cake pans.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow cakes to cool in pans for 10 minutes, then remove from pans and transfer to wire racks to cool completely.
Frost with cream cheese frosting and decorate as desired.
Slice and serve this classic red velvet cake for a decadent dessert!

name: Tiramisu
steps: In a heatproof bowl, whisk together egg yolks and sugar until well combined.
Place the bowl over a pot of simmering water, making sure the bottom of the bowl does not touch the water.
Whisk constantly until the mixture thickens and doubles in volume, about 4-5 minutes.
Remove from heat and whisk in mascarpone cheese until smooth. Set aside to cool slightly.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold whipped cream into the mascarpone mixture until well combined.
In a shallow dish, combine brewed coffee and coffee liqueur, if using.
Quickly dip each ladyfinger cookie into the coffee mixture, making sure not to soak them for too long.
Arrange a layer of soaked ladyfingers in the bottom of a 9x13 inch dish.
Spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers. Repeat with another layer of soaked ladyfingers and remaining mascarpone mixture.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Before serving, dust the top with unsweetened cocoa powder.
Slice and serve this classic Italian dessert chilled.

name: Apple Crisp

ingredients.name: Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored, and sliced

steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F.
In a large bowl, toss sliced apples with lemon juice, granulated sugar, and ground cinnamon.
Spread apple mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, rolled oats, brown sugar, and melted butter. Mix until crumbly.
Sprinkle crumb mixture over the apples in the baking dish.
Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and the apples are tender.
Serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for a comforting dessert!

name: Chocolate Mousse
steps: Place chopped semisweet chocolate in a heatproof bowl set over a pan of simmering water. Stir occasionally until melted and smooth. Remove from heat and let cool slightly.
In a large bowl, beat egg yolks with granulated sugar until thick and pale yellow.
Stir in melted chocolate and vanilla extract until well combined.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream until soft peaks form. Fold whipped cream into chocolate mixture.
In another bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gradually fold in powdered sugar.
Gently fold beaten egg whites into chocolate mixture until no white streaks remain.
Spoon mousse into serving dishes or glasses.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or until set.
Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate shavings before serving.
Indulge in this rich and velvety chocolate mousse for a luxurious dessert experience!

name: Banoffee Pie
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F.
In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, and melted butter. Press mixture into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie dish.
Bake crust for 10 minutes, then remove from oven and let cool completely.

Meanwhile, pour sweetened condensed milk into a pie dish. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and place in a larger baking dish. Fill the larger dish with hot water until it reaches halfway up the sides of the pie dish with the condensed milk.
Bake for 1.5 to 2 hours, or until the condensed milk has thickened and caramelized. Let cool.
Spread caramelized condensed milk evenly over the cooled crust.
Arrange sliced bananas over the caramel layer.
In a large bowl, whip heavy cream with vanilla extract until stiff peaks form. Spread whipped cream over the bananas.
Sprinkle grated chocolate over the whipped cream layer.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours before serving.
Slice and enjoy this heavenly banoffee pie with a perfect balance of caramel, bananas, whipped cream, and chocolate!

name: Strawberry Shortcake

ingredients.name: unsalted butter, cold and cut into cubes

steps: Preheat oven to 425Â°F.
In a large bowl, combine sliced strawberries with 1/4 cup granulated sugar. Set aside to macerate.
In another large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and remaining 1/3 cup granulated sugar.
Using a pastry blender or two knives, cut cold cubed butter into the flour mixture until it resembles coarse crumbs.
Stir in heavy cream and vanilla extract until a dough forms.
Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and gently knead a few times until it comes together.
Pat the dough into a circle about 1 inch thick.
Using a biscuit cutter, cut out rounds and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the shortcakes are golden brown.
Let the shortcakes cool slightly before assembling.
To assemble, slice the shortcakes in half horizontally. Spoon macerated strawberries and whipped cream over the bottom half of each shortcake, then place the top halves over the filling.
Serve immediately and enjoy this classic strawberry shortcake!

name: Vegan Chickpea Curry
steps: In a large skillet, heat coconut oil over medium heat.
Add diced onion and minced garlic. SautÃ© until onions are translucent.
Stir in curry powder and ground turmeric. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
Add chickpeas, coconut milk, and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer and let cook for 10-15 minutes, until sauce thickens.
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot over rice or quinoa. Enjoy your vegan chickpea curry!

name: Vegan Lentil Soup
steps: Rinse lentils under cold water and drain.
In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onion, diced carrots, and diced celery. SautÃ© until vegetables are softened.
Stir in minced garlic, dried thyme, and ground cumin. Cook for another minute until fragrant.
Add rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes (with juices), salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer.
Let the soup simmer for about 30-40 minutes, until lentils are tender.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
Serve hot with crusty bread or enjoy on its own. Vegan lentil soup is ready to be served!

name: Vegan Pad Thai
steps: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet or wok, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Add thinly sliced onion, julienned carrots, and thinly sliced red bell pepper. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add cubed firm tofu and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until tofu is heated through.
Stir in cooked rice noodles, bean sprouts, and chopped green onions.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, maple syrup, rice vinegar, and sriracha sauce. Pour over the noodle mixture in the skillet.
Toss everything together until well combined and heated through.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped peanuts and cilantro.
Enjoy your delicious vegan pad thai!

name: Vegan Lentil Sloppy Joes
steps: In a medium saucepan, combine brown lentils and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until lentils are tender. Drain any excess liquid and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onion and chopped green bell pepper. SautÃ© until vegetables are softened.
Stir in minced garlic and cook for another minute.
Add cooked lentils, tomato sauce, ketchup, maple syrup, mustard, chili powder, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Stir to combine.
Let the mixture simmer for 10-15 minutes, until heated through and flavors are melded together.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
Serve hot on hamburger buns.
Enjoy your vegan lentil sloppy joes!

name: Vegan Mushroom Risotto
steps: In a medium saucepan, heat vegetable broth over medium heat. Keep warm.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add finely chopped onion and sautÃ© until translucent.
Stir in minced garlic and cook for another minute.
Add sliced cremini mushrooms and cook until they release their juices and become tender.
Stir in arborio rice and cook for 1-2 minutes, until lightly toasted.
Pour in dry white wine and cook, stirring constantly, until the wine is absorbed.
Begin adding warm vegetable broth to the skillet, one ladleful at a time, stirring frequently. Allow each addition of broth to be absorbed before adding more.
Continue adding broth and stirring until the rice is creamy and cooked to your desired consistency (usually about 20-25 minutes).
Stir in nutritional yeast and vegan butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
Enjoy your creamy vegan mushroom risotto!

name: Vegan Tofu Stir-Fry
steps: Press tofu to remove excess moisture, then cut into cubes.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, rice vinegar, and sesame oil. Set aside.
In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add tofu cubes to the skillet and cook until golden brown on all sides. Remove tofu from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add bell pepper, julienned carrot, sliced zucchini, and broccoli florets. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
In a small bowl, mix together cornstarch and water to create a slurry.
Return tofu to the skillet, then pour soy sauce mixture over tofu and vegetables. Stir well to coat.
Add cornstarch slurry to the skillet and cook until sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot over cooked brown rice.
Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions before serving.
Enjoy your delicious vegan tofu stir-fry!

name: Vegan Black Bean Burgers
steps: In a large bowl, mash black beans with a fork or potato masher until mostly smooth.
Stir in cooked quinoa, finely chopped onion, finely chopped bell pepper, minced garlic, chopped cilantro, ground cumin, chili powder, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper.
In a small bowl, mix together flaxseed meal and water. Let sit for 5 minutes to thicken.
Add flaxseed mixture to the black bean mixture, along with breadcrumbs. Stir until well combined.
Divide mixture into 4 equal portions and shape into burger patties.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly oil the surface.
Cook burger patties for 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown and heated through.
Serve hot on burger buns, topped with lettuce, tomato, avocado, and onion slices.
Enjoy your homemade vegan black bean burgers!

name: Vegan Chickpea Salad Sandwiches
steps: In a large bowl, mash chickpeas with a fork or potato masher until partially mashed.
Stir in vegan mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, chopped celery, chopped red onion, chopped fresh parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
Spread chickpea salad onto bread slices.
Top with lettuce, tomato, and avocado slices.
Cover with another slice of bread to form sandwiches.
Serve immediately and enjoy your vegan chickpea salad sandwiches!

name: Vegan Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, and maple syrup. Set aside.
In another small bowl, mix together cornstarch and water to make a slurry. Set aside.
In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and sliced onion. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add sliced bell peppers, sliced carrot, broccoli florets, sugar snap peas, and any other desired vegetables to the skillet. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the soy sauce mixture over the vegetables in the skillet. Stir well to coat.
Give the cornstarch slurry a quick stir and then pour it into the skillet. Stir continuously until the sauce thickens.
Remove from heat and sprinkle sesame seeds over the stir-fry.
Serve hot over cooked rice.
Enjoy your vegan vegetable stir-fry!

name: Vegan Thai Green Curry
steps: In a large skillet or wok, heat coconut oil over medium heat.
Add sliced onion and minced garlic. SautÃ© until onions are translucent.
Add sliced red bell pepper, sliced yellow bell pepper, and sliced zucchini to the skillet. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Stir in green curry paste and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Pour in coconut milk, soy sauce, maple syrup, and lime juice. Stir well to combine.
Let the curry simmer for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
Stir in fresh basil leaves just before serving.
Serve hot over cooked rice.
Enjoy your flavorful vegan Thai green curry!

name: Vegan Lentil Tacos

ingredients.name: jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine dried green lentils and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until lentils are tender and most of the liquid is absorbed.
In a large skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat.
Add finely chopped onion, minced garlic, finely chopped bell pepper, and finely chopped jalapeno pepper. SautÃ© until vegetables are softened.
Stir in cooked lentils, chili powder, ground cumin, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill taco shells with lentil mixture.
Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomato, sliced avocado, salsa, and chopped cilantro.
Serve immediately and enjoy your vegan lentil tacos!

name: Vegan Sweet Potato and Black Bean Quesadillas

ingredients.name: medium sweet potatoes, peeled and diced

steps: Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
Place diced sweet potatoes on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with chili powder, ground cumin, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat evenly.
Roast sweet potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and slightly caramelized.
In a large bowl, mash black beans with a fork or potato masher until mostly smooth.
Lay out whole wheat tortillas on a flat surface.
Divide mashed black beans evenly among the tortillas, spreading them over half of each tortilla.
Top the black beans with roasted sweet potatoes and shredded vegan cheese.
Fold the tortillas in half over the filling to create quesadillas.
Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Place quesadillas in the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown and crispy, and the cheese is melted.
Remove quesadillas from the skillet and let cool for a minute before slicing into wedges.
Serve hot with salsa, guacamole, and vegan sour cream for dipping.
Enjoy your delicious vegan sweet potato and black bean quesadillas!

name: Vegan Coconut Curry Lentil Soup
steps: Rinse red lentils under cold water until the water runs clear. Drain well.
In a large pot, heat coconut oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onion and minced garlic. SautÃ© until onions are translucent.
Stir in curry powder and ground turmeric. Cook for another minute until fragrant.
Add red lentils, vegetable broth, coconut milk, diced carrot, and diced potato to the pot. Stir to combine.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and let simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until lentils and vegetables are tender.
Stir in spinach leaves and let them wilt into the soup.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Ladle soup into bowls and garnish with fresh cilantro.
Serve hot and enjoy your vegan coconut curry lentil soup!

name: Gluten-Free Quinoa Salad
steps: Rinse quinoa under cold water.
In a saucepan, bring water to a boil.
Add quinoa to the boiling water, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes or until quinoa is cooked and water is absorbed.
Remove cooked quinoa from heat, fluff with a fork, and let cool.
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, diced red bell pepper, diced yellow bell pepper, diced English cucumber, finely chopped red onion, and chopped fresh parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the quinoa salad and toss to combine.
Adjust seasoning if necessary.
Serve chilled and enjoy your gluten-free quinoa salad!

name: Gluten-Free Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: In a bowl, marinate sliced chicken breasts with tamari sauce and sesame oil. Let it sit for 15-30 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix together cornstarch and water to create a slurry. Set aside.
In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add marinated chicken slices and stir-fry until cooked through.
Add sliced bell pepper, julienned carrot, broccoli florets, and snap peas to the skillet. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the cornstarch slurry into the skillet and cook until the sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot over cooked rice.
Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions before serving.
Enjoy your gluten-free chicken stir-fry!

name: Gluten-Free Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
steps: Using a spiralizer, spiralize zucchinis into noodles.
In a food processor, combine fresh basil leaves, pine nuts, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, and nutritional yeast. Process until smooth.
Season the pesto with salt and pepper to taste.
In a large skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat.
Add zucchini noodles to the skillet and sautÃ© for 2-3 minutes until tender.
Remove zucchini noodles from heat and toss with the prepared pesto sauce.
Serve immediately and enjoy your gluten-free zucchini noodles with pesto!

name: Gluten-Free Banana Pancakes
steps: In a blender, combine ripe bananas, eggs, gluten-free rolled oats, baking powder, cinnamon, and vanilla extract.
Blend until smooth.
Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease with oil or butter.
Pour pancake batter onto the skillet to form pancakes of desired size.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface of the pancakes, then flip and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Repeat with remaining batter.
Serve hot with maple syrup and fresh berries.
Enjoy your gluten-free banana pancakes!

name: Gluten-Free Chicken and Vegetable Soup
steps: In a large pot, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat.
Add diced chicken breasts and cook until browned.
Add diced carrots, diced celery, diced onion, and minced garlic to the pot. SautÃ© until vegetables are softened.
Pour in chicken broth and add bay leaf, dried thyme, and dried rosemary.
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce heat and let simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until vegetables are tender and chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Remove bay leaf before serving.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve hot and enjoy your gluten-free chicken and vegetable soup!

name: Gluten-Free Chocolate Avocado Mousse
steps: Cut avocados in half, remove pits, and scoop the flesh into a food processor.
Add cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and coconut milk to the food processor.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Taste and adjust sweetness if necessary by adding more maple syrup.
Transfer the mousse into serving bowls or glasses.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Top with fresh berries and shredded coconut before serving.
Enjoy your gluten-free chocolate avocado mousse!

name: Gluten-Free Vegetable Quiche
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
Press the gluten-free pie crust into a greased pie dish.
Arrange zucchini slices, diced red bell pepper, diced yellow bell pepper, halved cherry tomatoes, and baby spinach evenly over the crust.
In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs and milk.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables in the pie dish.
Sprinkle shredded cheese over the top.
Bake in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes or until the quiche is set and golden brown on top.
Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing.
Serve warm or at room temperature.
Enjoy your gluten-free vegetable quiche!

name: Gluten-Free Lemon Blueberry Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
Line a muffin tin with paper liners or grease with cooking spray.
In a large bowl, whisk together gluten-free all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Add lemon zest and lemon juice to the dry ingredients and mix well.
In another bowl, whisk together melted coconut oil, coconut milk, and vanilla extract.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Gently fold in fresh blueberries.
Divide the batter evenly among the muffin cups, filling each about 3/4 full.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let the muffins cool in the tin for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Serve warm or at room temperature.
Enjoy your gluten-free lemon blueberry muffins!

name: Gluten-Free Cauliflower Pizza Crust
steps: Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
Cut cauliflower into florets and pulse in a food processor until it resembles rice.
Place cauliflower rice in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 5 minutes.
Allow cauliflower to cool, then transfer to a clean kitchen towel or cheesecloth. Squeeze out as much liquid as possible.
In a large bowl, combine cauliflower rice, gluten-free breadcrumbs, nutritional yeast, dried oregano, garlic powder, salt, and eggs.
Mix until well combined.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and press the cauliflower mixture into a thin, even crust shape.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and firm to the touch.
Remove from the oven and add desired toppings.
Return to the oven and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the toppings are heated through.
Slice and serve your gluten-free cauliflower pizza crust!
Enjoy your homemade gluten-free pizza!

name: Gluten-Free Chickpea Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine drained and rinsed chickpeas, diced cucumber, diced red bell pepper, finely chopped red onion, and chopped fresh parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the chickpea salad and toss to coat evenly.
Adjust seasoning if necessary.
Serve chilled and enjoy your gluten-free chickpea salad!

name: Gluten-Free Banana Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan.
In a large bowl, combine mashed ripe bananas, melted coconut oil, coconut sugar, and vanilla extract.
In another bowl, whisk together gluten-free all-purpose flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, stirring until just combined.
Fold in chopped nuts if using.
Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 50-60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let the banana bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
Slice and serve your gluten-free banana bread!
Enjoy!

name: Gluten-Free Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: In a small bowl, mix together tamari sauce, minced garlic, sesame oil, cornstarch, water, salt, and pepper to make the sauce. Set aside.
Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add a small amount of oil to the skillet.
Add broccoli florets, sliced red bell pepper, sliced yellow bell pepper, julienned carrot, and sliced zucchini to the skillet. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables in the skillet.
Stir well to coat the vegetables in the sauce.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the sauce has thickened.
Remove from heat and serve hot over cooked rice or quinoa.
Enjoy your gluten-free vegetable stir-fry!

name: Gluten-Free Lentil Soup

ingredients.name: dried green lentils, rinsed and drained

steps: In a large pot, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat.
Add diced onion, diced carrots, diced celery, and minced garlic to the pot. SautÃ© until vegetables are softened.
Add dried green lentils, vegetable broth, bay leaf, dried thyme, and dried rosemary to the pot.
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce heat and let simmer for 25-30 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Remove bay leaf before serving.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve hot and enjoy your gluten-free lentil soup!

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Stir in cooked pasta, chopped parsley, and lemon juice. Toss until well combined.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese.
Enjoy your garlic butter shrimp pasta!

name: Caprese Stuffed Avocados
steps: Scoop out a little extra avocado from each half to create more room for stuffing.
In a bowl, combine cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and chopped basil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and toss to combine.
Spoon the tomato and mozzarella mixture into the avocado halves.
Drizzle balsamic glaze over the stuffed avocados.
Serve immediately and enjoy your caprese stuffed avocados!

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: In a saucepan, heat vegetable broth over medium heat. Keep warm.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and cook until translucent.
Add minced garlic and sliced mushrooms to the skillet. Cook until mushrooms are golden brown.
Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 1-2 minutes until lightly toasted.
Pour in dry white wine and cook until the liquid is absorbed.
Add a ladleful of warm vegetable broth to the skillet and stir until absorbed.
Continue adding broth, one ladleful at a time, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and tender, about 20-25 minutes.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese, butter, and chopped parsley. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot, garnished with additional grated Parmesan cheese and parsley if desired.
Enjoy your mushroom risotto!

name: Honey Mustard Glazed Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
In a small bowl, whisk together honey, Dijon mustard, olive oil, minced garlic, lemon juice, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Brush the honey mustard glaze over the salmon fillets.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.
Enjoy your honey mustard glazed salmon!

name: Vegetarian Stuffed Bell Peppers

ingredients.name: bell peppers, halved and seeds removed

steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn kernels, diced tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese, minced garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Mix until well combined.
Stuff each bell pepper half with the quinoa and vegetable mixture.
Place stuffed bell peppers in a baking dish.
Cover with foil and bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes.
Remove foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until bell peppers are tender.
Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro before serving.
Enjoy your vegetarian stuffed bell peppers!

name: Crispy Baked Chicken Tenders
steps: Preheat oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and lightly grease with cooking spray.
In one shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
In another shallow dish, place all-purpose flour.
In a third shallow dish, beat eggs.
Dredge each chicken tender in flour, then dip into beaten eggs, and finally coat with breadcrumb mixture.
Place coated chicken tenders on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and coating is golden brown and crispy.
Serve hot with honey mustard sauce for dipping.
Enjoy your crispy baked chicken tenders!

name: Greek Salad
steps: In a large salad bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, Kalamata olives, thinly sliced red onion, and crumbled feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
Adjust seasoning if necessary.
Serve chilled and enjoy your Greek salad!

name: Lemon Garlic Butter Grilled Shrimp
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
In a small bowl, combine minced garlic, melted unsalted butter, fresh lemon juice, chopped fresh parsley, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.
Thread shrimp onto skewers.
Brush both sides of shrimp with the lemon garlic butter mixture.
Grill shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side, or until pink and opaque.
Remove shrimp from the grill and serve immediately.
Enjoy your lemon garlic butter grilled shrimp!

name: Quinoa Black Bean Salad
steps: In a large salad bowl, combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn kernels, diced red bell pepper, diced green bell pepper, and chopped fresh cilantro.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, ground cumin, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
Adjust seasoning if necessary.
Serve chilled and enjoy your quinoa black bean salad!

name: Teriyaki Tofu Stir-Fry

ingredients.name: extra firm tofu, pressed and cubed

steps: In a small bowl, mix together tamari sauce, minced garlic, sesame oil, cornstarch, water, salt, and pepper to make the sauce. Set aside.
Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add a small amount of oil to the skillet.
Add tofu cubes to the skillet and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Remove tofu from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add more oil if needed.
Add broccoli florets, sliced red bell pepper, sliced yellow bell pepper, julienned carrot, and sliced zucchini to the skillet. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables in the skillet.
Stir well to coat the vegetables in the sauce.
Return the cooked tofu to the skillet and toss to combine.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the sauce has thickened and tofu is heated through.
Remove from heat and serve hot over cooked rice or quinoa.
Enjoy your teriyaki tofu stir-fry!

name: Gluten-Free Lemon Blueberry Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). Line a muffin tin with paper liners or grease with non-stick cooking spray.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together gluten-free all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, mix together unsweetened applesauce, vegetable oil, fresh lemon juice, and lemon zest.
Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Gently fold in fresh blueberries.
Fill each muffin cup about 3/4 full with batter.
Bake in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow muffins to cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
Once cooled, dust with powdered sugar before serving.
Enjoy your gluten-free lemon blueberry muffins!

name: Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a small bowl, whisk together gluten-free all-purpose flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large mixing bowl, cream together softened unsalted butter, granulated sugar, and packed brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in egg and vanilla extract until well combined.
Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
Fold in semisweet chocolate chips.
Drop tablespoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until edges are golden brown.
Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Enjoy your gluten-free chocolate chip cookies!

name: Gluten-Free Banana Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C). Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan.
In a medium bowl, whisk together gluten-free all-purpose flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large mixing bowl, cream together softened unsalted butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs, one at a time, until well combined.
Stir in mashed ripe bananas, milk, and vanilla extract.
Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
Fold in chopped walnuts if using.
Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow banana bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Slice and serve. Enjoy your gluten-free banana bread!

name: Gluten-Free Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook gluten-free fettuccine according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add seasoned chicken breasts to the skillet and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 6-7 minutes per side.
Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Stir in heavy cream, grated Parmesan cheese, and unsalted butter.
Cook, stirring constantly, until the sauce has thickened and cheese has melted.
Slice cooked chicken breasts into strips.
Return sliced chicken to the skillet and toss to coat in the Alfredo sauce.
Add cooked fettuccine to the skillet and toss until evenly coated in the sauce.
Season with additional salt and pepper if needed.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.
Enjoy your gluten-free chicken Alfredo!

name: Vegetarian Lentil Soup
steps: Rinse dried green lentils under cold water and drain well.
In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add diced onion, carrots, and celery to the pot. Cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Add minced garlic, dried thyme, dried oregano, and ground cumin to the pot. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Stir in dried green lentils and vegetable broth.
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce heat to low and let it simmer, partially covered, for 25-30 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Stir in spinach leaves and cook until wilted.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.
Enjoy your vegetarian lentil soup!

name: Caprese Pasta Salad
steps: Cook rotini pasta according to package instructions. Drain and rinse with cold water.
In a large bowl, combine cooked rotini pasta, halved cherry tomatoes, diced fresh mozzarella, and chopped fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle balsamic vinegar and extra virgin olive oil over the pasta salad.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Toss until everything is well coated.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
Enjoy your Caprese pasta salad!

name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
steps: In a large salad bowl, combine drained and rinsed chickpeas, halved cherry tomatoes, diced cucumber, thinly sliced red onion, halved Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
Adjust seasoning if necessary.
Serve chilled and enjoy your Mediterranean chickpea salad!

name: Honey Garlic Shrimp Stir-Fry
steps: In a small bowl, whisk together honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, sesame oil, cornstarch, and water to make the sauce. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add broccoli florets, sliced red bell pepper, and sliced yellow bell pepper to the skillet. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Push vegetables to one side of the skillet and add peeled and deveined shrimp to the other side.
Cook shrimp for 2-3 minutes on each side until pink and opaque.
Stir the sauce and pour it over the shrimp and vegetables in the skillet.
Cook, stirring constantly, until the sauce has thickened and coats the shrimp and vegetables.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot over cooked rice.
Garnish with sesame seeds and thinly sliced green onions.
Enjoy your honey garlic shrimp stir-fry!
